channel.title: Busan on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: The sea I want, it's all there. Busan Songdo Marine Cable Car - Seo-gu, Busan, Korea
item.description:
Walking on the sea, flying in the sky, all the seas we want

The sea I want, it's all there. Busan Songdo Marine Cable Car

Seo-gu, Busan, Korea

If you open Facebook or Instagram some time ago, there are photos that make up social media. A sea cable car in Busan Songdo, which runs through the cool sea against a blue sky and white clouds! Even the picture alone made my stuffy chest pierced. There is a reason to go to Busan, so there is no need to hesitate. I just booked a train ticket.
The seas of Busan we know are about Haeundae, Gwangalli, and Taejongdae. Song-do? His head is smiling with a question mark. But it is reverse. The middle-aged parents' generation hit Songdo first, rather than Haeundae. Turning the time back 50 years ago, the best beach in Busan in the 1960s is the Songdo Beach. At that time, Haeundae couldn't even give out a business card, so Songdo is visible again.
Songdo Beach with fine sand and indigo sea
Songdo Beach was opened in 1913. It holds the title of Korea's first public beach. When Songdo Beach was in full swing, there were four specialties. Cable cars, bridges, diving platforms and cruise ships. The nation's greatest reputation began to fall due to environmental pollution in the 1970s. In 1987, the typhoon Selma was overwhelmed, the bridge and the diving platform collapsed completely, and the cable car stopped operating the following year.
Songdo Beach installed in Turtle Island
Songdo is now regaining its glory. The cable car began to fly again, and a nice cloud trail over the bridge was placed over the sea. In the middle of the sea, a large turtle-shaped diving platform appeared, as well as a promenade along the sea that was not available in those days, making Songdo's day more full.
Songdo Beach has regained its old reputation
11:00 Walk on the sea, Cloud Trail
Songdo Beach, the superstar of the old year, was crushing at first sight. I love the dazzling blue sea and the wide, fine beaches that look like a half moon. People who plunge into the sea and are walking along the waves crashing in the white, regretting the summer going, each enjoys Songdo Beach.
A cloud trail with the sea spreading on both sides
The small island on the eastern end of the beach is Turtle Island. A cloud trail runs across the sea past Turtle Island. A shelter in the shape of a ship is decorated at the entrance, and in the photo zone of the bow, there is a lover who creates the scene of the movie Titanic. As you enter the promenade, the sea spreads smoothly on both sides. Looking to the right is the sea, and looking to the left is the sea. Even down the sea is visible. The bottom of the bridge is made of tempered glass, so the sea is soft. It is literally a scene where a miracle walks on the sea.
Taste the miracle of walking on the sea
Total length is 365m. It is a sufficient distance to enjoy the sea in a relaxed manner. Turtle Island has small attractions such as turtle sculptures, and it is good to take a break from the sea breeze. After passing the turtle island, the promenade stretches 100m towards the sea. At the end, I'm dyed to the depths of my chest.
Now it's time to go take the cable car offshore, but Mount Geumgang is also around. Not far from the Cloud Trail, there is a 100-year Songdo Alley. Inside the alley, there are various restaurants from old wheat noodles to new pasta houses.
Turtle Island in the middle of the cloud trail
13:00 Flying over the sea, Songdo Marine Cable Car
If you push it, it will quickly remove the subtraction and finally take the marine cable car. I was in agony for a while before riding. Riding a regular cable car or a crystal cruise with a transparent bottom. Aside from the fear of heights, I chose Crystal Cruise. After spending a lot of time in a long line of realization of popularity, I finally climbed the cable car.
Landscape 100 points excitement
"Wow ~ I'm killing the sea landscape." "It's amazing!" Gyeongsang-do's exclamation with us is not going to stop. In short, you can forget about the cable car you've taken so far.
The best feeling to carry over the sea
The cable car, which is transparent to the floor in a panoramic view made of glass everywhere, seems to burst beyond thrill. In the distance, Busan Tower and Namhang Bridge can be seen at a glance, and clouds in the sky pass by.
Busan Tower and Namhang Bridge at a glance
The moment I see the dark sea at my feet, I feel like a superman flying in the sky for a while. The scenery score and thrill score are both perfect.
Crystal cruise with transparent bottom
The Songdo Marine Cable Car boasts a total length of 1.62 km and a maximum height of the marine cable car of 86 m. The open sea scenery is the best. When you get off at Songdo Sky Park (Upper Station), there is the Skyha Version Observatory.
Songdo scenery seen from Skyha version observatory
The view of Songdo Sea, the sky and the cable car flying over it can be seen at a glance. Songdo Doppel My World, located on the 1st basement floor, is a cable car museum where you can see the history of Songdo Cable Car at a glance. The first cable car and the latest cable car are placed side by side, and you can also experience a vivid VR experience like riding a sea cable car.
The first cable car and the latest cable car
15:00 Meet the scenery of 100 million years along the sound of waves, Songdo Coastal Trail
There is a coastal walkway from Amnam Park with an upper stop to Songdo Beach. You can use a round trip, but that is why you bought a ticket one way. The Coastal Trail is a designated spot for Busan National Geopark. You can walk along the deck path and see the sedimentary rocks accumulated 100 million years ago. The sound of waves lays in the background while meeting the plump geology and admiring the open sea. It takes 30 minutes to reach the Songdo Beach, but it is difficult to resist the temptation when you meet the way down the middle and middle coast. When many ships are immersed in the landscape of the Songdo coast where they anchored, it is timeless.
Songdo Coastal Trail created over a billion years of sedimentary rocks
There was no dazzling trail in the sea, an exhilarating cable car in the sky, and rumors that the night scene would kill him, but I pledged to the next and went home.
Songdo Coastal Trail
Travel information

Songdo Marine Cable Car (Busan Air Cruise)

-Address: 171 Songdo Haebyeon-ro, Seo-gu, Busan

-Inquiries: 051-247-9900

http://www.busanaircruise.co.kr/

item.title: Surfing trip between men, Songjeong Beach, Busan - Haeundae-gu, Busan, South Korea
item.description:
Local surfer surfing at Songjeong Beach

Surfing trip between men, Songjeong Beach, Busan

Haeundae-gu, Busan, South Korea

Surfing is no longer the subject of a movie or a longing. Yangyang, Taean, and Pohang have already established themselves as surf spots. What's the theme of this, because men are building strong friendships? In particular, the Songjeong Beach in Busan is suitable for beginners, making it perfect for first surfing.
Man travel, friendship and challenge surfing!
For several years, the fever of tvn <Youth over Flowers> has been strong. The ringing was loud for the cast and men in their 20s and 40s. In the meantime, there were many bad trips (?) For men's trips. However, <Youth over Flowers> harmonized with men's sticky friendship and the theme of 'challenge', dreaming of a healthy trip with friends.
Songjeong Beach, popular as a surf spot as well as a beach
Surfing satisfies both themes of 'friendship' and 'challenge'. Surfing in Hawaii or the Gold Coast is a misunderstanding if you think that surfing on the Internet is only a matter of other countries. There are more surf spots in Korea than I thought, including Yangyang Jukdo, Taean Manripo, Pohang Chilpo, and Jeju Jungmun. The equipment is also simple and relatively easy to access. It is no longer left as one of the bucket lists. It will be a challenge to meet your friends. There is nothing better than this, as we learn together and build up friendships.
Surfholic's exterior where you can learn to surf at Songjeong Beach
Among them, Busan Songjeong Beach is a good place to start surfing. Since the South Sea and the East Sea meet, the south swell from spring to summer and the northeast swell in winter can enjoy surfing in all seasons. In addition, the waves of the knee are frequent and the lessons are conducted at the depth of the waist, making it perfect for beginners to surf. Currently, about 10 surf schools and equipment rental companies have entered the beach. Local surfers have already emerged since the late 1990s, and almost 20 years have passed. International surfing competitions have been held since 2009. It is worthwhile to be a mecca of surfing in Korea.
Surfboards on display at Surfholic
Surfing, there is an entrance, but there is no exit
For lessons, use surfing schools such as Surfholic and Songjeong Surfing School around Songjeong Beach. Songjeong has been systematically taking classes since the first generation surfers in Korea took root. The course is generally divided into Day 1, Day 3, and Day 5.
Surfing lesson day 1 theoretical training
Day 1 is followed by theory, ground exercises, and practice of acquisition. The theory explains the title of each part of the board, the rules of surfing, and safety.
Day 1 surfers practicing paddling on the sandy beach
Ground exercises are conducted on sandy beaches. The basic movements of the surf are paddle padding to paddle with your arms when the waves come in, push-ups to raise your upper arms to reach the waves, and take-offs to raise your knees to the lower body, finally balancing and riding the waves Is divided into Repeat this motion on the sandy beach to wear it. It is boring, but the performance of practice is directly related to the practice. Of course, I usually realize this after a few bumps on the water.
Surfboard prevents loss by connecting with the leash cord of the surfer ankle
At first, the water practice is on the board with the help of the instructor, rather than speeding up with paddling. At this time, the position of the foot on the board, the gaze, and the process of quickly converting from push-up to take-off are important. Repeat this a few times and notice the timing of the waves. Quick learners stand on the board in two or three turns and ride the waves.
Push-up posture while standing on the surfboard
On the second day, start with paddling and practice climbing yourself. If the board focuses on going straight in by the 2nd day, from the 3rd day, challenge the side riding on the oblique side of the wave surface. Day 4-5 is the process of deepening what you have learned until day 3. The cost is around 65,000 won on the first day and 150,000 won on the third day, including equipment rental. Personal training is only possible after learning at least 3 days. Of course, after the 1st day experience, most of them continue until the 3rd day.
Surfers heading to the sea for surfing
Surfing is very special because it slides on the water. It is a pleasure that you have never felt before. It has a different charm than a snowboard running on a snowy field. It's hard to break up once you fall into the charm that flows like a fish over the waves. "Surfing is like a mob. Once you're in there, there's no exit," said Kelly Slater, former World Surfer (WSL) champion. Surfing is a passionate and fascinating report.
Surfboard as a symbol of Songjeong Beach
The class time is about 3 hours per day. Starting in June, you can overlap with the surfers, so you will teach in the surf zone. In the summer, there are many people who want to learn to surf, so it's a good idea to challenge before the peak season begins. Some companies, such as Surfholic, lend their equipment and help them practice personally even after the class is over until May.
You can ride the wave with only 1st day training
Surfing is not greatly affected by the weather. It is good to surf in the rain on a rainy day. You can't swim because you wear a buoyant suit. In addition, the surfboard is connected to the ankle with a leash cord, making it easy to manage underwater. Preparations include a swimsuit, light toiletries and sunscreen. Beginners are advised to make a reservation after confirming in advance as low tide time is safe. Children can challenge if they are over 135cm tall.
Surf training is relatively safe at shallow water
Trip to Busan, Walking along the tracks of Songjeong Station
After surfing, go to Songjeong Station on the East Sea Nambu Line at the entrance of the beach. Songjeong Station was opened in 1934 and was designated as a registered cultural property in 2006. In 2013, the Donghae Nambu Line reached its end of life and lost the function of the station. I can feel the faded time everywhere. Currently, it is operated as a citizen gallery. Works were installed inside and outside the station.
Permanent exhibition inside Songjeong Station
The Donghae Nambu Line has also been reborn as an old trail. It is 4.8km from Songjeong Station to Cheongsapo Saegil to Mipo Crossing. They go through short tunnels and walk while looking at the sea. Either from Songjeong Station or Mipo, it takes 40 minutes to Cheongsapo Saegil and the rest of the trip takes about 40 minutes. When walking is a burden, you can take a walk around Songjeong Station lightly.
Travelers walking on the old road of the Donghae Nambu Line

item.title: Suyeong-gu, Busan, South Korea - Feast of confession hotter than fireworks, Busan Fireworks Festival
item.description:
A scene from the Busan Fireworks Festival

Feast of confession hotter than fireworks, Busan Fireworks Festival

Suyeong-gu, Busan, South Korea

To leave memories that will last a lifetime, everyone will dream of a trip. There is a festival where you can add your confession to your loved one. Opportunity to communicate the heart with fireworks against the background of moist night sea and sweet music. I want to love you. Let's go to Busan night sea where Busan Fireworks Festival is held every year.
Confession of love delivered by fireworks

In October, the Busan Fireworks Festival is held every year. This year, two days from October 23, the theme of `` The beginning of love is confession '' was unchanged, and the city of Busan Gwangalli was brilliantly embroidered. However, we have prepared a much richer composition and various programs than before, and above all, we changed the way of directing the fireworks and greatly expanded the space of the fireworks show.

The fireworks show, the center of the festival, has become more colorful and has made the hearts of the viewers more chewy. First of all, he invited the world's best overseas flame team to be enthralled. In addition, the way the fireworks were produced has not changed much over the past 10 years. Unlike the previous one, which was held for 50 minutes under one theme, it took a 5-minute break after the 15-minute invitational fireworks show, and increased the concentration by directing it to the melody that suits the theme 'The beginning of love is confession' for 35 minutes.

During the five-minute break, special events caught the attention of the people. To commemorate the 50th anniversary of the normalization of Korean-Japanese relations, a fire broke out on the Tsushima Island closest to us beyond the Korea Strait.
The fireworks you see in person are even more impressive.
The stage, which is bigger than ever, was also noticed. This year, Busan Fireworks Festival is the largest in history. Considering that visitors were unable to watch properly due to the concentration of visitors, the stage of the '-' shape, which was spread around Gwangan Bridge, was expanded to the shape of a 'U' band after Dongbaek Island, Gwangalli and Igidae. As a result, the stage production was also changed, so the fireworks were much richer than before.
The fireworks you see in person are even more impressive.
Cultural arts, street performances and eve events are also abundant.
The Busan Fireworks Festival was only one day on the 24th, but on the 23rd, the day before, it was no less enjoyable. The biggest change is the eve concert. Last year's eve concert was held at Gwangalli Beach at 7:00 pm on the 23rd, which had nothing to do with the fireworks festival. Kim Beom-soo, Kim Tae-woo, Park Ji-min, Bernard Park, Son Seung-yeon, Jeong Dong-ha, Ali, and other singers gave me a more powerful stage than the fireworks. After the last night's concert, a 15-minute “overnight fireworks show” was held to inspire the festival.
Citizens enjoying the Busan Fireworks Festival
On the day of the festival, abundant sights were waiting for us. In addition to occupying good seats, young artists performed street performances from 2:00 pm for those who gathered from early times because they missed expectations.
Street performance attracting people's attention
Various events were spread along the Gwangalli Beach such as bands, dancing, percussion, and DJing to enjoy the event until 8 o'clock when the fireworks festival began.
Street performance attracting people's attention
The fireworks festival is over, but there are ways to enjoy the afterglow. The winning work of the Busan Fireworks Festival, which was held to become a festival with citizens, is on display at the Suyeong Riverside Special Exhibition Hall on the 31st under the theme of "Harmony of Light and Softening."
Street performances for both men and women
Travel info

Busan Fireworks Festival
Venue: Gwangalli Beach, Gwangan Bridge
Contact / Reservation: 051-501-6051

http://www.bff.or.kr/KOR/Fireworks/main.asp
